title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The All Types dialog in JDK 1.4 is displaying obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc. It should not show these obfuscated classes.
OB: The All Types dialog is currently displaying obfuscated class names.
EB: The All Types dialog should not display obfuscated class names.
SR:
To resolve this issue, two possible solutions are: 
a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Completely filter out the obfuscated classes. 
I suggest implementing solution a).
